# userInfo

**Instance Property**

An opaque value for the list item.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var userInfo: Any? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Use this property to attach a value that provides additional context to the list item. For example, you can attach a model object and reference it in the list item’s [doc://com.apple.carplay/documentation/CarPlay/CPListItem/handler] when processing the selection.

## Managing Configuration

- **isEnabled**: A Boolean value that indicates if the item is enabled.
- **handler**: An optional closure that CarPlay invokes when the user selects the list item.
